programme.desc: A nostalgic reflection on some of Tottenham's most unforgettable matches in the Champions League including interviews with former stars and managers who made history for the club.

programme.title: MotoGP Highlights
programme.desc: Race action from the 2025 Moto3 Grand Prix of Czechia at Automotodrom Brno. Britain's Scott Ogden will be looking to ride to his first victory of the season.

programme.title: MotoGP Highlights
programme.desc: Race action from the 2025 Moto2 Grand Prix of Czechia at Automotodrom Brno. Can Britain's Jake Dixon claim a third win of the season?

programme.title: MotoGP Highlights
programme.desc: Action from the Sprint Race at the 2025 MotoGP Grand Prix of Czechia at Automotodrom Brno. Can anyone stop Marc Marquez from claiming an 11th Sprint win of the season?

programme.title: MotoGP Highlights
programme.desc: Race action from the 2025 MotoGP Grand Prix of Czechia at Automotodrom Brno. Ducati's Marc Marquez will be chasing a fifth consecutive Grand Prix win.

programme.title: MotoGP Chequered Flag
programme.desc: Post-race show featuring analysis, highlights and interviews with all the key riders following the Grand Prix of Czechia at Automotodrom Brno.

programme.title: FIA TCR World Tour
programme.desc: A look back at the best action from the 2025 TCR World Tour at Circuito Internacional in Vila Real, Portugal.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Action from the opening weekend of the 2024/25 Premier League season as newly promoted Ipswich Town welcome Arne Slot's Liverpool to Portman Road.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Action from the Premier League as Fabian Hurzeler's Brighton host Manchester United at Amex Stadium. Brighton have won four of their last five league games against the Red Devils.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Action from the Premier League as Arsenal face Fabian Hurzeler's Brighton at Emirates Stadium. Both sides have won their first two league games of the season.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Action from the Premier League as Southampton welcome Manchester United to St Mary's Stadium.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Action from the Premier League as West Ham United host their local rivals Chelsea at London Stadium.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Action from the Premier League as Newcastle United face Manchester City at St James' Park. Newcastle have won just one of their last 33 top-flight games against City.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Action from the Premier League as Crystal Palace face Liverpool at Selhurst Park. Oliver Glasner's Palace are still looking for their first league win of the season.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Premier League action from the London derby between Tottenham and West Ham United at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium. Spurs have lost four of their last six London derbies in the league.

programme.title: Premier League Stories
programme.desc: We celebrate the unique legacy of footballing dynasties in the Premier League; where talent, passion, and pride are passed from one generation to the next. From the iconic saves of Peter Schmeichel to the rise of his son Kasper, the goal-scoring legacy of Ian Wright carried on by son's Shaun and Bradley, and the Lampards' deep-rooted Chelsea connection, this episode explores the bonds that tie foo

programme.title: SailGP
programme.desc: SailGP Highlights from the 2025 Emirates Great Britain Sail Grand Prix, as a fleet of 12 F50s battle it out for victory in the tumultuous waters of the Solent.

programme.title: Tour de France Cycling
programme.desc: Highlights from stage 16 of the 2025 Tour de France, as the riders face a 171km route from Montpellier to the top of Mont Ventoux. Who will thrive on the famed Beast of Provence?

programme.title: The Gruppetto
programme.desc: We review all the action from the Tour de France up until the second rest day. Also, we look ahead to the 2025 Tour de France Femme.

programme.title: Race Bikes
programme.desc: In the 1990's, Jeff Steber created what was widely credited as being the first ever downhill bike. Shaun Palmer, one of the sport's most important athletes, secured its legacy.

programme.title: TNT Sports Films
programme.desc: This documentary looks back on the incredible life of two-time world champion Barry Sheene 20 years on from his death.

programme.title: MotoGP Highlights
programme.desc: Race action from the 2025 Moto3 Grand Prix of Czechia at Automotodrom Brno. Britain's Scott Ogden will be looking to ride to his first victory of the season.

programme.title: MotoGP Highlights
programme.desc: Race action from the 2025 Moto2 Grand Prix of Czechia at Automotodrom Brno. Can Britain's Jake Dixon claim a third win of the season?

programme.title: Australian Rules
programme.desc: Action from the Australian Football League as ladder leaders Collingwood play Fremantle at the MCG. The Magpies won 97-83 when these sides last met.

programme.title: Australian Rules
programme.desc: Australian Football League action as Adelaide Crows face Gold Coast Suns at Adelaide Oval. The Suns have lost all 11 matches they have played at this venue.

programme.title: Fishing: On the Bank
programme.desc: Angling magazine show presented by Rob Hughes and Andy Ford. Rob goes in search of perch in the most unlikely of places and fish farming comes under the spotlight.

programme.title: Australian Rules
programme.desc: Action from the Australian Football League as Essendon meet GWS Giants at Marvel Stadium. Can the Giants extend their winning streak to five games?

programme.title: Australian Rules
programme.desc: Action from the Australian Football League as Brisbane Lions take on Western Bulldogs at the Gabba. The Dogs will need a big upset to keep in the top-eight hunt.

programme.title: Australian Rules
programme.desc: Australian Football League action as Hawthorn go head-to-head with Port Adelaide at UTAS Stadium. The Power have won their past four matches against the Hawks.

programme.title: Australian Rules
programme.desc: Action from the Australian Football League as Sydney Swans face North Melbourne at the SCG. The Swans have beaten their Kangaroos in their last nine matches.

programme.title: Australian Rules
programme.desc: Australian Football League as Carlton take on Melbourne at the MCG. Both sides come into this contest with a 6-11 record.

programme.title: Premiership Rugby
programme.desc: A look back at the story of the 2024/25 Gallagher Premiership Rugby season, as Bath claimed the title for the first time since 1996.

programme.title: Premiership Rugby
programme.desc: We revisit the best tries of the 2024/25 Gallagher Premiership Rugby season, including Tom Roebuck, Kalaveti Ravouvou, Cadan Murley and many others.

programme.title: TNT Sports Films
programme.desc: Former Leinster, Ireland and Lions rugby captain Brian O'Driscoll goes on a discovery to better understand the mental health struggles elite sportsmen face following retirement.

programme.title: Major League Baseball
programme.desc: Highlights from Major League Baseball.

programme.title: Live: FISU Summer World University Games
programme.desc: Day five of the swimming at the 2025 Summer World University Games in Rhine-Ruhr, including the Women's 200m Breaststroke Final and the Mixed 4x100m Freestyle Relay Final.

programme.title: FIA TCR World Tour
programme.desc: A look back at the best action from the 2025 TCR World Tour at Circuito Internacional in Vila Real, Portugal.

programme.title: Tour de France Cycling
programme.desc: Highlights from stage 15 of the 2025 Tour de France, as the riders traverse a hilly 169km course from Muret to the medieval city of Carcassonne.

programme.title: Australia Championship Supercars
programme.desc: Highlights from the Supercars Championship and day one of the NTI Townsville 500 at Reid Park in Queensland.

programme.title: Australia Championship Supercars
programme.desc: Highlights from the Supercars Championship and day two of the NTI Townsville 500 at Reid Park in Queensland.

programme.title: WRC Review
programme.desc: A look back at the latest action from the 2025 World Rally Championship and Rally Estonia.

programme.title: The Ultimate Fighting Championship
programme.desc: Action from UFC 318 at Smoothie King Center in New Orleans, featuring Dustin Poirier's retirement fight against old rival Max Holloway.

programme.title: What Went Down
programme.desc: Adam Catterall is joined by UFC featherweight fighter Alexander Volkanovski to rewatch his biggest moments in the Octagon, including his debut win and his battles with Islam Makhachev.

programme.title: Fight Week
programme.desc: A review of UFC 318 at Smoothie King Center, New Orleans, featuring Dustin Poirier's retirement fight against old foe Max Holloway.

programme.title: Prem Classics
programme.desc: We delve into the Premier League archive to bring you a Classic Match from the 2018/2019 season.

programme.title: Australian Rules
programme.desc: AFL action as West Coast Eagles meet Richmond at Optus Stadium. The Tigers won 90-81 when these sides last met in round nine.

programme.title: Australian Rules
programme.desc: Action from the Australian Football League Geelong Cats face St Kilda at GMHBA Stadium. The Cats have lost their past two meetings with the Saints.

programme.title: Australian Rules
programme.desc: Action from the Australian Football League as ladder leaders Collingwood play Fremantle at the MCG. The Magpies won 97-83 when these sides last met.

programme.title: Australian Rules
programme.desc: Australian Football League action as Adelaide Crows face Gold Coast Suns at Adelaide Oval. The Suns have lost all 11 matches they have played at this venue.

programme.title: IFSC Climbing World Cup
programme.desc: Highlights from the Men's and Women's Lead finals at the 2025 IFSC Climbing World Cup in Madrid, Spain.

programme.title: Major League Baseball
programme.desc: Highlights from Major League Baseball.

programme.title: WNBA Basketball
programme.desc: Action from the 2025 WNBA All-Star Game at Gainbridge Fieldhouse in Indianapolis, as a team lead by Caitlin Clark takes on Team Napheesa Collier.

programme.desc: Coverage of day two of the athletics at the 2025 Summer World University Games in Rhine-Ruhr, including the Women's and Men's 100m Finals and the Women's Long Jump Final.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Classics
programme.desc: We revisit the first leg of the 2001/02 UEFA Champions League semi-final between Barcelona and Real Madrid, who were chasing their first win at the Nou Camp for almost 19 years.

programme.title: The Goldfinger
programme.desc: Based on Hong Kong's biggest financial scandal of Ching Yat Yin, who rises from rags to become a billionaire. An ICAC investigator spends 15 years to uncover the truth behind his rapid rise in wealth.

programme.title: Wish Comes True
programme.desc: Fei meets young talent Wai who suffers from a rare disease, and helps Wai find his lost love. Even when they know the drug treating Wai is ineffective, they choose to embrace hope and love together.

programme.title: Mission Milano
programme.desc: Andy Lau & Huang Xiao Ming embark on a cross-border quest in the quest to protect an incredible new invention from an international crime conglomerate.

programme.title: YUM Investigation
programme.desc: A team of investigators was sent to an old building believed to be haunted by evil spirits, only to discover an unexpected secret concerning the future of the structure.

programme.title: Romantic Dream
programme.desc: A mechanic bumps into his dream girl for the second time after making his pile. This time, he just may get to be with her, even if itis only in his dreams.

programme.title: Last Suspect
programme.desc: A lawyer must defend a murder suspect and win the case in order to save her daughter who has been taken hostage. As evidence emerges, she unveils the truth and the man behind the case.

programme.title: My Wife Is A Gambling Maestro
programme.desc: Gambling queen, Ying Ying who is a contender for the Asian God of Gamblers competition and rescued by Gerrard but suffering from amnesia, she decided recover in time to compete in the big event!

programme.title: Young Ip Man Crisis Time
programme.desc: Set in 1917, young Ip Man pursues his studies in Hong Kong. The whole school is held hostage during the day of an English speech competition.

programme.title: Better Days
programme.desc: A high school student befriends a street punk as she copes with college entrance exam pressure and ruthless bullying. A murder investigation is set to alter both their lives.

programme.title: Find Your Voice
programme.desc: Renowned conductor Yin Tze Long agrees to lead a pilot program training 3 underperforming school choirs to participate in an inter-school choral competition.

programme.title: The Sex and the Beauties
programme.desc: Featuring an all-star cast, this HK comedy version of Sex & the City is about single, successful psychiatrist Selina and other beauties in search of their true love and happy endings.

programme.title: Call Me Agent
programme.desc: Miu Ling, who dreams of becoming a secret agent, accidentally rescues an injured spy. He agrees to make her his apprentice, turning her upside down as she goes on madcap adventures.

programme.title: Break Up Club
programme.desc: Jaycee Chan plays a 20-something slacker who discovers a magical website that may help reunite him and his girlfriend but at what cost?

programme.title: Inner Senses
programme.desc: Haunted by recurring visions stemming from past traumas, Yan seeks help from psychiatrist Dr Jim. As she heals, Jim is haunted by the same disturbances when his suppressed memories resurface.

programme.title: Saving General Yang
programme.desc: Ekin Cheng, Vic Chow, Raymond Lam & Wu Chun, star in this tale that depicts how the seven sons of General Yang set out to rescue their father from an army of thousands.

programme.title: Band Four
programme.desc: An aspiring singer reunites with her estranged guitarist father, and along with other family members, they unite to support each other through their love for music.

programme.title: Nezha
programme.desc: Produced by megastar Jay Chou, this drama starring Will Liu & Wang Jun Kai depicts how a former top team racing driver's focus on proving himself leads to his team's downfall.

programme.title: Far Far Away
programme.desc: A computer geek who has only been in love once suddenly & surprisingly finds himself getting romantically involved with five different women. Will he find "the-one"?

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon
programme.desc: This action crime drama stars Donnie Yen & Andy Lau as a drug kingpin and a corrupt policeman who team up to build an underworld empire in 1960s Hong Kong.

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: Set in 2020 during the outbreak of COVID-19, the movie features interconnected stories of three women's lives as they navigate the uncertain future amongst their respective friends and families.

programme.title: The Eye
programme.desc: Adapted from a true story, a young girl named Mun undergoes a corneal transplant to correct her blindness, only to find herself gifted not only with sight but also the ability to see ghosts.

programme.title: Love Lies
programme.desc: Gynaecologist Veronica falls for an online dating app scam with young Joe, who poses as a French engineer. What begins as a romance built on lies ultimately transforms two seemingly mismatched souls.

programme.title: Cyber Heist
programme.desc: After a security engineer unwittingly becomes involved in a money laundering operation, he must fight against his boss in the cyber world to prove his innocence.

programme.title: I Believe
programme.desc: Chu Chu waits 10 years for her first love, who marries another. Losing faith, she meets a wedding planner and a wealthy man, both offering solace. Torn between them, who will she choose in the end?

programme.title: Cliff Walkers
programme.desc: Zhang Yi Mou's first spy thriller follows four Communist Party special agents who embark on a secret mission in the Japanese puppet state of Manchukuo - only to be sold out by a traitor.

In this new series of Silvias Italian Masterclass we are offered an intimate insight into Silvias kitchen, who loves nothing more than to share what she has learnt along the way, so that you too can muster the beauty of simple, Italian homecooking.

From the makers of The Chase comes an all-new quiz show that sees contestants compete to be part of the Winning Combination. Presented by Omid Djalili, this perfect storm of players, money and general knowledge questions could see four players walk away with some serious cash. In each episode, the game begins with each contestant drawing a number from one to nine. General knowledge battles whittle

The Poles Revealed is a three-part, science documentary series about the two extreme ends of the Earth. Taking viewers on a journey of discovery above and below the ice, this is a program that is as breathtakingly beautiful, as it is informative and entertaining.

Every time a plane crashes, the world takes notice. And so do the experts whose job it is to figure out what happened. MAYDAY uncovers the truth behind the most legendary aviation disasters, and every episode features eyewitness accounts, captivating reenactments, state-of-the-art CGI, and interviews with the investigators who ultimately determined what went wrong.

From visionary filmmakers James Cameron and Robert Rodriguez comes ALITA: BATTLE ANGEL, an epic adventure of hope and empowerment. When Alita (Rosa Salazar) awakens in a future world she does not recognize, she is taken in by a compassionate doctor (Christoph Waltz) who realizes that somewhere in this abandoned cyborg shell is the heart and soul of a young woman with an extraordinary past.

programme.title: Trtle 3
programme.desc: Its summer in Muddlemere, a tranquil little town right on Muddle Lake. Wild animals have made themselves at homehere, not in direct contact with humans, but close enough to enjoy the comforts of civilisation. programme.desc: Latest news headlines, current events, photos, and exclusive stories from eyewitnesses in Asia, Middle East, and Africa.

programme.desc: Teletubbies stars iconic characters; Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po. Their world is full of love and laughter as they explore Home Dome and the magical countryside of Teletubbyland through play. programme.desc: The Wombats organize the Treeborhood Talent Show. Malik and Zeke create their own Brother Day. Zadie makes noise with her Really Big, Really Loud Noisy Thing. The Wombats build a giant snow globe for Zeke. Super invents a Huggyback rider. Malik perfects a magic trick. The Wombats turn their one bedroom into three.

programme.title: Welcome to Bric-a
programme.desc: Mino is a lively city cat: cheerful, crafty and very boisterous. In the hope of calming him down, his parents have sent him to a countryside holiday camp for the summer. Mino cant think of anything worse! Hes stuck in the middle of nowhere on a dilapidated farm run by an old goat and a scatty giraffe. programme.desc: Get up to speed on critical news and events in Hong Kong and around the rest of the world. We give our viewers insight on the stories that matter the most, ranging from business to breaking news, key events, as well as all the latest sporting action, twice daily.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S2 21
programme.desc: Journey across the pond to London for heartwarming adventures with beloved British bear Paddington in this CG-animated series, which centers on a younger Paddington as he writes letters to Aunt Lucy celebrating the new things he has discovered through the day's exciting activities.
Andy Allen - Masterchef Australia Judge, alongside Michael Weldon and Courtney Roulston take you on a food journey to find the freshest produce and create inspiring recipes in the kitchen.
Dream Home is set to take the renovation genre to new heights as six pairs of everyday Aussies battle it out room by room, transforming tired suburban family homes into astonishing new dream homes.

It's the only unsolved air piracy case in history. In 1971, a man hijacks a Northwest Orient Airlines flight, demanding 4 parachutes and $200,000. He jumps out of the plane with the money and is never seen again. Can new evidence finally reveal the identity of the anonymous hijacker known as D.B. Cooper?

In 2015 Mercedes-AMG set out to crack one of the last barriers within the automotive industry: The first street legal Hypercar with F1 Technology. What was supposed to be the ultimate Highlight within the Motorsports Industry soon turned into a nightmare that put the image of the entire Mercedes Group on the spot. Failure was not an option.

In our modern world, we tend to think that technology and scientific knowledge can help protect us from almost anything, including natural disasters. But is that really true? Or are we just as vulnerable today in the face of raging fires, violent earthquakes, and destructive hurricanes as our ancestors were in the past?

programme.desc: Featuring the chilling true stories of false prophets who thought they were above the law, Cult Justice explores the magnetic power of criminal cult leadersand the dramatic investigations that finally brought them to justice.
